Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



During his farewell speech Tuesday night in Chicago Obama joked You can tell that Im a lame duck because no ones following instructions. although he was clearly just making a joke the statements Obama made during his farewell speech throughout the night were clearly contradictory with Trumps campaign promises PERIOD Obamas speech covered many topics including immigration climate change Muslims and his health care law PERIOD

If every economic issue is framed as a struggle between a hardworking white middle class and undeserving minorities then workers of all shades will be left fighting for scraps while the wealthy withdraw further into their private enclave. although that statement can be interpreted many different ways it is clearlycontradictoryto Trumps lifestyle and campaign platform PERIOD Obama also indirectly called out the Republican Party stating thatif anyone can put together a plan that is demonstrably better than the improvements weve made to our health care system  that covers as many people at less cost  I will publicly support it. although many of his statements in his farewell address werent particularly pointed at Trumps presidency his executive order in December clearly was PERIOD His orderrequired that the President of the United States be a federal taxpayer even though he encouraged peoplenot to read too much into the timing of his executive order it was quite a statement PERIOD
